content: Please accept this <style=PlayerName>{物品}</style>, yeep? Why did I prepare it in advance? {A笑眯眯}...Because I knew you could do it!
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: {A加油}Watching yourself move step by step toward your goal is quite a fascinating experience, isn't it?
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: {A加油}I believe you'll achieve your goal soon. Here's [article_or_num:1,{物品}] <style=PlayerName>[quant_noun:1,{物品}]</style> for you — surprise! Consider it a token of my best wishes.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: {A笑眯眯}No matter the goal you pursue, perseverance alone is a form of accomplishment.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: By the way, regarding your goal of <style=Highlight>{玩家目标}</style> that you mentioned earlier, is it still on your to-do list?
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: {A思考星光}Don't rush. Goals that demand patience and perseverance often foster growth that transcends boundaries.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: This <style=PlayerName>{物品}</style> is for you. It's nothing extraordinary. Remember to rest well, and know that I'm here whenever you need me.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: I present you with this <style=PlayerName>{物品}</style>. Please let my gift, along with myself, convey congratulations on your achievement.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标
NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: {A拍手}What a moment worthy of celebration, yeep! This was clearly no easy feat, yet you accomplished it splendidly. I am proud of you.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: I've been considering a similar plan lately. {A笑眯眯}Perhaps... I might achieve it before you do, yeep? And this <style=PlayerName>{物品}</style> is for you, as a token of my good wishes.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标

content: Here you are, [article_or_num:1,{物品}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{物品}]</style>. Not merely a token of consolation, but a symbol of my sincere belief — a celebratory gift for the moment of triumph I am certain I will witness.
info: NPC事件模板24-关怀目标-1005幻雪_24-关怀目标
